set.name: ST-03
set.longname: [One Piece] [ST-03] The Seven Warlords of the Sea

card.name: [OP] Crocodile [ST03-001]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −4 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 5 or less to the owner's hand.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Baroque Works]

card.name: [OP] Crocodile [ST03-003]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [DON!! x1] [On Block] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Baroque Works]

card.name: [OP] Gecko Moria [ST03-004]
card.text: [On Play] Add up to 1 {The Seven Warlords of the Sea} or {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character with a cost of 4 or less other than [Gecko Moria] from your trash to your hand.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Thriller Bark Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Dracule Mihawk [ST03-005]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Draw 2 cards and trash 2 cards from your hand.

prop.type: [Fish-Man] [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [The Sun Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Sentomaru [ST03-007]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] ➁ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.): Play up to 1 [Pacifista] with a cost of 4 or less from your deck, then shuffle your deck.

card.name: [OP] Trafalgar Law [ST03-008]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Heart Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Donquixote Doflamingo [ST03-009]
card.text: [On Play] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 7 or less to the owner's hand.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Donquixote Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Bartholomew Kuma [ST03-010]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and return them to the top or bottom of the deck in any order. [Trigger] Play this card.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Revolutionary Army]
[The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Buggy's Delivery]

card.name: [OP] Boa Hancock [ST03-013]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [Trigger] Play this card.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Kuja Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Marshall.D.Teach [ST03-014]
card.text: [On Play] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Blackbeard Pirates]

card.name: [OP] Sables [ST03-015]
card.text: [Main] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 7 or less to the owner's hand. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Baroque Works]

card.name: [OP] Thrust Pad Cannon [ST03-016]
card.text: [Counter] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Counter] effect.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Revolutionary Army]

card.name: [OP] Love-Love Mellow [ST03-017]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, draw 1 card if you have 3 or less cards in your hand.

prop.type: [The Seven Warlords of the Sea] [Kuja Pirates]
